remarks: Value of a pointwise operation on two functions defined using maps-to notation.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ofmpteq $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ ( x e. A |-> B ) Fn A /\ ( x e. A |-> C ) Fn A ) -> ( ( x e. A |-> B ) oF R ( x e. A |-> C ) ) = ( x e. A |-> ( B R C ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d R x $.
